view.renderEngine

Class EntityRenderer

  • java.lang.Object
    • view.renderEngine.EntityRenderer

  • public class EntityRenderer
extends java.lang.Object
    Delegate renderer to handle the rendering of entities.

    An Entity is any object within the game that is not part of the world (ie the terrain or skybox)

    Author:
    Marcel van Workum - 300313949

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      EntityRenderer(EntityShader shader, org.lwjgl.util.vector.Matrix4f projectionMatrix)
      Constructor

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void render(java.util.Map<TexturedModel,java.util.List<Entity>> entities)
      Renders the game entities in batch, reducing draw calls

      Saves time and space using a map, rather than each entity having a unique texture

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • EntityRenderer

        public EntityRenderer(EntityShader shader,
              org.lwjgl.util.vector.Matrix4f projectionMatrix)
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        shader - ShaderProgram to handle shader for each entity rendered
        projectionMatrix - 4x4 Projection Matrix defining how the entity is projected

    • Method Detail

      • render

        public void render(java.util.Map<TexturedModel,java.util.List<Entity>> entities)
        Renders the game entities in batch, reducing draw calls

        Saves time and space using a map, rather than each entity having a unique texture

        Parameters:
        entities - Map of TexturedModel to a List of Entity, as each textured model may have many entities using that texture.
